trade_slide.text: In {{latest_year}}, firms with tax residence in {{geo.caption}} exported {{trade_volume}}, making {{geo.caption}} the {{rank}} largest exporter in Chile. During the last {{number_of_years}} years the exports of {{geo.caption}} have {{increased_or_decreased}} at an annualized rate of {{annualized_rate}}, from {{trade_first_year}} in {{first_year}} to {{trade_last_year}} in {{last_year}}. {{geo.caption}}'s top exports are {{trade_first_product}} ({{trade_first_share}} of the total), {{trade_second_product}} ({{trade_second_share}} of the total)
